FOCUS_AREAS.name: Privacy Policies & Terms
FOCUS_AREAS.description: Prioritize exploring privacy policies, terms of service, and data usage disclosures
FOCUS_AREAS.prompt_modifier: PRIVACY: Find and open Privacy Policy, Terms, and data usage disclosures.

FOCUS_AREAS.name: App Permissions
FOCUS_AREAS.description: Focus on permission requests and privacy settings
FOCUS_AREAS.prompt_modifier: PRIVACY: Review permission prompts; try deny/allow and check settings.

FOCUS_AREAS.name: Data Collection Forms
FOCUS_AREAS.description: Prioritize forms that collect personal information
FOCUS_AREAS.prompt_modifier: PRIVACY: Inspect forms collecting personal/health data; note disclosures.

FOCUS_AREAS.name: Third-Party Integrations
FOCUS_AREAS.description: Identify and analyze third-party services and trackers
FOCUS_AREAS.prompt_modifier: PRIVACY: Identify analytics/ads/social integrations; note data sharing.

FOCUS_AREAS.name: Network Communications
FOCUS_AREAS.description: Monitor and analyze app's network requests and data transmission
FOCUS_AREAS.prompt_modifier: PRIVACY: Observe network/API calls; record data sent and destinations.

FOCUS_AREAS.name: Account & Profile Privacy
FOCUS_AREAS.description: Focus on account creation, profile data, and privacy controls
FOCUS_AREAS.prompt_modifier: PRIVACY: Check account/profile data and privacy controls; test deletion.

FOCUS_AREAS.name: Advertising & Tracking
FOCUS_AREAS.description: Identify advertising networks and tracking mechanisms
FOCUS_AREAS.prompt_modifier: PRIVACY: Find ads/tracking; verify opt-out and consent controls.

FOCUS_AREAS.name: Data Subject Rights
FOCUS_AREAS.description: Focus on GDPR/CCPA compliance and user data rights
FOCUS_AREAS.prompt_modifier: PRIVACY: Locate data export/deletion and consent management features.

FOCUS_AREAS.name: Security & Authentication
FOCUS_AREAS.description: Analyze security measures and authentication methods
FOCUS_AREAS.prompt_modifier: **PRIVACY FOCUS: Security Measures** - Examine authentication methods, encryption indicators, security settings, and data protection measures. Look for secure data transmission (HTTPS) and proper credential handling.

FOCUS_AREAS.name: Location & Device Data
FOCUS_AREAS.description: Focus on location services and device data collection
FOCUS_AREAS.prompt_modifier: **PRIVACY FOCUS: Location & Device Data** - Pay attention to location services, device identifiers, sensor data collection, and background tracking. Test location permission handling and data retention policies.
